entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 09:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

Humidity: 85 %

Wind: NW 9 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers this morning then 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1500 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Snow level 1500 metres rising to 1900 metres overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
